title: 3 Days in Paradise
description: After an accident leaves Dani stranded in the middle of nowhere, a helpful stranger happily drives her to Paradise, and though the residents are warm and friendly, she finds every means of leaving blocked by one thing after another. She begins to suspect foul play, but once she finally gets back home, she learns the shocking secrets of Paradise, and will stop at nothing to get back there.
author: Chameleon
